alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Hanover; Henrico; King William; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 4:20PM EDT until April 26 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Charles City County in east central Virginia... New Kent County in east central Virginia... Southeastern Henrico County in central Virginia... Southeastern Hanover County in central Virginia... Southeastern King William County in east central Virginia... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 420 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bottoms Bridge, or near Highland Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bottoms Bridge around 430 PM EDT. Roxbury and Adkins Store around 435 PM EDT. Talleysville and Providence Forge around 440 PM EDT. New Kent around 450 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Chickahominy Shore, Wayside, Mountcastle, Elko, Cohoke, Sandston, Glendale, Westwood, Lanexa and Rose Garden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; Hanover; Henrico; King William; New Kent
